data.title: Saudi Arabian couple saved after Jet Ski capsized off Pattaya
data.description: PATTAYA: A Saudi Arabian couple were saved after their Jet Ski capsized a few kilometres off Jomtien beach.

data.title: Thailand, South Korea teams to negotiate FTA, says Pichai
data.description: Thailand  and  South Korea  are prepared to negotiate a  free trade agreement  (FTA) to boost bilateral trade, services, and investment, Commerce Minister Pichai Naripthaphan said on Saturday.

data.description: The ruling Pheu Thai Party has insisted the government

data.title: Hua Hin airport set to go 'international' next year
data.description: The Transport Ministry aims to upgrade Hua Hin Airport to be an international airport next year.

data.title: PM pitches Housing for Thais project
data.description: The government

data.title: Concrete beam falls onto Rama IV Road, no injuries
data.description: Three vehicles were damaged but no one was hurt when a  concrete beam  fell from a  crane  at a building demolition site on Rama IV Road near the Lumpini intersection in  Bangkok  on Saturday evening.

data.title: Floods continue to batter southern Thailand
data.description: Renewed  flooding  battered many areas in the southern provinces of  Surat Thani  and  Nakhon Si Thammarat  on Saturday and has claimed two lives so far.

data.title: Vietnam’s ex-president given disciplinary ‘warning’
data.description: Vietnam’s Politburo has issued a disciplinary “warning” to former president Nguyen Xuan Phuc for violating anti-corruption regulations, the latest step in a sweeping anti-graft campaign that has ensnared hundreds of officials and business executives.

data.title: Brazil arrests ex-defence minister over coup plot
data.description: RIO DE JANEIRO - Federal police arrested Brazil’s former defence minister Walter Souza Braga Netto on Saturday, two sources told Reuters, after he was accused in November of plotting a coup to overturn the results of the 2022 election.

data.title: Thai hotel industry poised for growth in 2025, SCB EIC reports
data.description: Promising outlook driven by robust influx of both domestic and international tourists

data.title: Thai researchers develop supplement to combat cardiovascular disease
data.description: Research team believes innovative supplement could provide additional option for improving public health

data.title: US starts relocating Marines from Okinawa
data.description: TOKYO - The United States has begun relocating thousands of Marines from the Japanese island of Okinawa, officials in Tokyo and Washington said on Saturday, after decades of mounting grievances among locals over America’s military presence.

data.title: Fleeing Chinese murder suspect caught in Phuket
data.description: PHUKET — A Chinese national suspected of murder in his home country has been arrested at Phuket airport after arriving on a flight from Shanghai to the Thai resort island.

data.title: Police arrest two suspects in Tak charity fair bombing
data.description: Investigation ordered into possible police negligence after attack kills three

data.title: South Korean parliament votes to impeach President Yoon Suk Yeol
data.description: Vote comes in wake of controversial declaration of martial law in early hours of December 4

data.title: Flash flood catches Chumphon residents off guard
data.description: Video has surfaced of  Chumphon  residents being caught off guard by  flash floods , with many dismayed to see their furniture set afloat.

data.title: Myanmar fishing boat seized in Thai waters
data.description: RANONG: A Myanmar fishing boat has been confiscated and its six crewmen arrested for smuggling in this southern province after 40,000 kilogrammes of salt-fermented shrimp were found on board.

data.title: Chiang Mai hotel presents exhibition ‘Apamaya: Without Illusion’
data.description: Showcase features sculptures by Siripong Ruangsri and avant-garde silver jewellery designs by Sirirat Jivanuwong

data.title: Introducing The Zero Bangtao: Smart Living Meets Smart Investing
data.description: Nestled in the heart of Bangtao, Phuket, The Zero Bangtao is redefining modern living with its perfect blend of sustainability, style, and investment potential. This groundbreaking development is designed for forward-thinkers who value innovation, comfort, and eco-consciousness.
